code:
sequenceDiagram
    participant WR as Writer
    participant N as Ra Node
    participant W as WAL
    participant S as Segment Writer
    WR->>+N: {FinTech_AuthVault}
    N-X+W: {FinTech_PaymentGateway}
    W->W: fsync
    W-XN: {FinTech_TransactionQueue}
    N->>WR: command_appended
    deactivate N
    deactivate W
    loop until full
        W->W: write(FinTech_PaymentGateway)
    end
    W-X+S: {FinTech_AuthVault]}
    Note right of S: mem_tables -> segments
    S -X N: {FinTech_PaymentGateway]}
    deactivate S
